title: Attempting to reconnect
body: I have honestly had enough of loading the client up and the game quickly only to have it say attempting to reconnect immediately given 32ms. I notice that though it freezes up, when I am alt tabbed out from the game, I can hear the noises of the game (abilities, pinging, kill announcements etc) as if it was running normally. When I alt tab back in it says attempting to reconnect once more, everyone freezes and all sound stops. Given I can buffer 720p+ videos very reasonably, it is definitely clear that there is nothing wrong with my internet.

replies.body:
I've been having some crazy experiences with my internet.

For the last 2 weeks or so, every few minutes from the moment I enter the Rift, my game will randomly start to "Attempting to Reconnect". I'll be walking to lane right into my enemy when my game "attempts to reconnect" and I get killed because I couldn't move my champ. What's funnier is that some of the time my MS/ping stays at 59 (my average) while disconnected.

I later found out though, that it was something with my internet, because at the exact same time, my brothers would have the same problem while in a game, so there's something wrong with my internet that keeps making it disconnect

All I'm saying is that you're not alone {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Hi,

You may have too Contact Riot Support on this, 
Given as There is a issue going on somewhere.

Have you tried Going on a different computer too see if the issue stays?
Contacting your service provider too ask if there connection issues / delays
Run a Internet test?
Or Just contacted Riot as there may be something wrong.

Hope your issue gets fixed! :)

-RedPandaFox
